items.title: birthday
items.prompt:
Create a glamorous birthday photoshoot portrait with direct flash photography. The scene is set against a plain, neutral-colored wall, illuminated by a round, focused spotlight positioned behind me. The spotlight creates a sharp, dramatic shadow cast onto the wall, adding strong contrast and a cinematic, editorial feel.

I am posed in side profile, leaning slightly forward with graceful posture, as if gently blowing out the candles on a strawberry birthday cake that I hold delicately with both hands. The cake is topped with lit number candles reading “30”, their warm glow subtly illuminating my face and enhancing the celebratory atmosphere.

I am wearing an elegant pink ball gown with a luxurious silhouette, flowing fabric, and refined details that catch the flash beautifully. The lighting emphasizes texture, shape, and contrast, creating a bold yet polished look.

The overall mood is festive, glamorous, and high-fashion, combining hard flash lighting, dramatic shadows, and clean composition, resembling a professional editorial birthday photoshoot with crisp details and a cinematic finish.

items.title: birthday
items.prompt:
Create a full-body, highly realistic portrait using my exact face and body from the uploaded photo, without altering my facial features, proportions, or natural appearance. She appears to be around 26 years old, with fair white skin and a graceful, well-balanced physique.

She is smiling softly with a closed mouth, looking directly at the camera, expressing warmth, elegance, and calm confidence. Her long, wavy black hair flows naturally over her shoulders.

She is wearing an elegant, modest soft pink gown made of layered tulle and organza, with a tasteful off-shoulder design that provides good coverage, and delicate 3D floral details on the shoulders. The gown has a refined silhouette and a soft, flowing train, maintaining a classy and non-revealing appearance.

She is squatting gracefully, slightly angled toward the left, holding a white birthday cake decorated with golden spiral candles, positioned clearly in front of her.

Behind her, large floating pink number balloons “26” are fully visible within the frame, centered and positioned slightly above and behind her head, tied with thin strings. Ensure the balloons are not cropped and not partially outside the image, remaining clear and readable.

She wears soft pink pointed heels and a subtle, minimal necklace.

The scene is set in a clean gray studio background, evenly lit with soft, diffused studio lighting. Gentle shadows add depth while maintaining a smooth, polished look. The overall style is high-resolution fashion photography, festive yet elegant, with a soft matte finish and a refined editorial aesthetic.

items.title: Studio
items.prompt:
Create a highly realistic, photorealistic image of the same man from the uploaded photo, accurately preserving his facial features, proportions, and overall appearance.

He is sitting confidently on a simple metal stool, centered against a solid warm yellow background that feels clean and modern. He wears a cozy, oversized beige fleece jacket layered over a cream-colored hoodie, paired with matching cream jogger pants, creating a soft, monochromatic streetwear aesthetic.

On his feet, he wears chunky white sneakers with subtle purple accents, adding a contemporary and fashionable edge to the outfit. His pose is relaxed and natural, with his hands resting casually between his legs, conveying calm confidence and effortless style.

The lighting is soft, even, and well-balanced, gently highlighting the textures of the fleece jacket, fabric folds, and sneaker details without harsh shadows. The overall mood is minimal, stylish, and modern, resembling a professional fashion studio portrait with high-resolution, realistic detail.

items.title: mountain
items.prompt:
Edit this photo into a realistic scene of the same woman, keeping her face exactly as in the original photo, accurately preserving her facial features and structure.

She is sitting on the peak of a mountain, posing naturally with both legs extended and slightly bent, while holding a cup of coffee in one hand. She is wearing a black mountain jacket, white cargo pants, and white sneakers, giving a clean and modern outdoor look.

Her hair is long and straight, flowing naturally, with the lower part of the hair slightly curly, gently moving in the mountain breeze. Her expression appears calm, relaxed, and peaceful, as if enjoying the moment.

The background features a beautiful panoramic mountain landscape, with multiple mountain layers stretching into the distance and realistic clouds floating among the peaks. The atmosphere is a bright, clear morning, with soft sunlight, fresh air, and natural sky tones.

Use natural morning lighting, with high attention to detail in skin texture, clothing fabric, hair strands, and environmental elements. The overall result should look highly realistic, cinematic, and like a professional outdoor travel photograph.

Aspect ratio: 9:16 (portrait orientation)

items.title: Flower girl
items.prompt:
Create a highly realistic, photorealistic portrait of the same woman, precisely preserving her facial structure and natural features. She is lying on her stomach, resting her chin gently on both hands, with a calm, serene, and thoughtful expression. Both of her eyes are fully visible and unobstructed.

She has long, dark, softly wavy hair flowing naturally around her face and shoulders. She is wearing a light-colored, off-the-shoulder top with soft puff sleeves, giving an elegant and airy appearance.

She is surrounded by lush flowers and greenery, with a ceramic vase filled with fresh white lilies placed nearby. No flowers are being held in her hands, and nothing covers her face or eyes. The floral elements remain purely as background and surrounding details.

The scene is illuminated with soft, diffused natural lighting, creating gentle shadows and a dreamy, cinematic mood. Skin texture, fabric folds, and floral details should appear lifelike and natural. The overall composition feels intimate, peaceful, and refined, rendered in ultra-high resolution with true-to-life photographic realism.

Aspect ratio: 9:16 (portrait orientation)

items.title: Stairs
items.prompt: A highly realistic photograph of a young man seated stylishly on an old iron staircase outside a building. He is wearing a loose beige T-shirt, faded blue jeans, white sneakers, a gold wristwatch, and round sunglasses. One elbow rests on the railing while his other hand supports his chin in a confident pose. The background features weathered concrete walls with soft, cinematic lighting in a slightly warm tone. His hairstyle is neat and voluminous, reflecting a modern urban style. Keep the pose, outfit, body, camera angle, lighting, and background exactly the same, but replace the face with [user’s face], maintaining natural skin tone and consistent lighting.

items.title: Beach
items.prompt:
Create a golden-hour, cinematic full-body vertical portrait of a melancholy young man standing on a rugged rocky boulder at the edge of the beach, quietly gazing toward the crashing ocean waves.

He is styled in a V-neck, color-block oversized sweater layered over a light yellow shirt, paired with baggy, distressed jeans and classic Converse sneakers, giving the look a relaxed yet emotionally expressive silhouette.

The scene is lit entirely with natural golden-hour light, casting warm highlights and soft shadows across the subject and landscape. The focus is sharp on the subject, with a cinematic bokeh effect softening the background. Birds glide through the sky above, waves crash below, and the air feels alive with motion.

Apply warm, cinematic color grading to enhance the emotional tone and coastal atmosphere. The overall mood should feel reflective, poetic, and cinematic—balancing solitude and scale—while maintaining 100% accurate facial features and likeness from the reference image.

items.title: Face
items.prompt:
Use the provided face reference image to ensure precise facial features and likeness.

Style the subject in a fitted black turtleneck layered under a dark tailored blazer, finished with sleek round eyeglasses for a modern, intellectual edge. No additional props—keep the focus on a sharp profile, clean lines, and the way light reflects across the face and frames.

Set the backdrop as a bold, vibrant orange wall sliced by deep, diagonal shadows, creating striking color-field geometry and graphic contrast.

Pose the subject looking upward toward the light source, chin slightly raised, with a thoughtful, introspective expression that feels confident and composed.

Light the scene with harsh, direct sunlight that casts a strong, directional beam, producing crisp, angular shadow patterns across the background and subtly across the subject, reinforcing a dramatic, editorial aesthetic.

The overall mood should feel minimal, architectural, and fashion-forward—clean composition, strong contrast, and gallery-level visual impact.

items.title: books
items.prompt:
Create a striking fine–art black-and-white photograph of a handsome young man with dark features, captured in a moment of intense creative release. His head is tilted back, eyes lifted or closed, conveying deep thought, inspiration, or near-ecstasy. His hands are open and relaxed, as if surrendering to the flow of ideas.

He is dressed in a loose, white collared shirt that contrasts sharply against the dark environment. The setting is a dimly lit study, dense with atmosphere—stacks of books piled high, scattered papers suspended midair, as if caught in motion around him.

The image is shot using a slow shutter speed, creating dramatic horizontal motion blur that streaks across the background and softly distorts the edges of his figure, amplifying the sense of movement and mental intensity. Despite the motion, the subject remains powerfully present and ultra-realistic.

The overall aesthetic is cinematic and surreal yet grounded in realism—high contrast, rich textures, and fine-art depth—evoking the raw energy of creativity captured in a single, timeless frame.

items.title: park
items.prompt:
Create a cinematic, high-fashion editorial photograph of the uploaded person, using the reference image to maintain exact facial features and likeness.

The scene takes place in a peaceful park on a bright, sunny day. The subject is seated on a lush, vibrant green lawn, relaxed and grounded in the environment. He is wearing an oversized black t-shirt paired with loose, baggy khaki cargo pants, giving the look a modern, effortless editorial feel.

Accessories are minimal and refined: a single, slim silver chain around the neck and a bracelet on one wrist. He is gazing off to the side with a calm, introspective expression, not directly at the camera.

Beside him rests a black backpack, with blue headphones casually placed on top. A book lies nearby, with a sunflower gently set on its cover, adding a soft, poetic touch to the composition.

The lighting is natural and warm, enhancing skin tones and creating a serene, aesthetic mood. Capture the image in ultra–high-resolution 4K detail with a subtle grainy film texture, evoking a stylish, cinematic editorial look. The overall vibe should feel peaceful, thoughtful, and fashion-forward, with the face matching the reference image 100% accurately.

items.title: beach
items.prompt:
Create a moody beachside portrait at dusk, captured as if someone snapped the photo using a direct camera flash. The surrounding environment is dark and atmospheric, while the flash highlights my face with a warm, sun-kissed glow—skin appearing slightly luminous with a soft, natural shimmer.

In the background, the sun is 98% set, leaving behind a dramatic deep purple-to-red sky that fades into near darkness, creating a cinematic twilight beach mood.

The image is taken from behind my back as I turn my head and upper body toward the camera, creating a candid over-the-shoulder moment. I’m wearing a loose, light-yellow linen shirt that is fully buttoned and intact, with sleeves casually rolled up. A subtle gold seashell necklace rests above the fabric, adding a refined coastal detail.

My hair is windswept with relaxed surfer energy. The photo is cropped from just above the waist, keeping the focus on the upper body, expression, and glowing beach aesthetic. The overall feel is intimate, natural, and coastal—flash photography contrasting against a dark, sunset-lit shoreline.

items.title: Poster
items.prompt:
Use a vibrant setting such as a painted street-art wall or a clean, high-saturation backdrop in turquoise, hot pink, or bright yellow to create an energetic urban feel.

Dress the subject in relaxed streetwear—think a denim jacket paired with sneakers and casual layers—to emphasize a modern, city-inspired vibe.

Add playful, graffiti-style doodles that stay tight to the subject’s outline, wrapping around the head, shoulders, arms, and torso. Include hand-drawn elements like stars, thick arrows, paint drips, lightning bolts, and quirky abstract shapes to create motion and personality.

Position all typography close to the subject, floating near the face and body rather than in open background areas, so each word feels directly connected to their movement and attitude. Use chunky comic- or graffiti-inspired lettering with black outlines and bold, high-contrast colors.

Replace the text with:

FUN



WILD



HUSTLE



MOVE



SHINE

The overall look should feel bold, youthful, and expressive—high-energy street art aesthetics with clean composition, where doodles and text amplify the subject without overpowering them.

items.title: Poster
items.prompt:
Set the background to a minimal, high-impact gradient—either sunset orange fading into soft pink or aqua blending into electric yellow—to create strong contrast while keeping the focus on the subject.

Style the subject in a clean, solid neutral outfit (black, white, or denim) so the graphic elements remain bold and clearly readable.

Place all typography clustered tightly around the subject—hovering near the head, shoulders, torso, and arms—so each word feels personally connected rather than floating in empty space. Integrate bold pop-art–inspired doodles with hand-drawn comic lines, halftone dots, energetic shapes, and expressive brush strokes that wrap around the figure’s silhouette.

Use contrasting accent colors (red, teal, yellow, purple) that harmonize with the gradient background while keeping visual balance.

Replace all text with:

DRIVE



CREATE



STRONG



BRAVE



RISE

Typography should feel playful yet powerful, using handwritten comic-style lettering enclosed in speech bubbles, bursts, zig-zags, and bold arrows that point toward or interact with the subject’s body and pose. The overall vibe should be modern, clean, and uplifting, with the doodles enhancing the subject’s energy without overwhelming the image.

items.title: Car
items.prompt: Place me sitting casually on the bonnet of a red Porsche Cayenne, with vast mountains stretching into the distance and a dramatic sunset glowing behind them. I’m dressed in a relaxed yet stylish travel outfit, blending comfort with understated luxury. The scene should resemble a high-end DSLR travel photograph, featuring natural light, warm sunset hues, soft shadows, and a cinematic depth of field that captures a sense of freedom, exploration, and refined adventure.

items.title: Car
items.prompt:
A highly realistic, full-body portrait of the man from the reference image, set against a sleek black Mercedes-Benz AMG parked on a modern city street lined with towering glass skyscrapers. He is dressed in a dark navy tailored suit paired with a crisp white dress shirt and polished black leather Oxford shoes, embodying elegance and understated luxury.

His pose is confident yet effortless, with his back and shoulder lightly resting against the car and his arms relaxed, projecting a sense of quiet power and ownership of the moment. The overall atmosphere is cinematic and luxurious, captured in ultra-realistic detail, with natural daylight reflecting off the car’s glossy black surface and the surrounding glass architecture, enhancing the high-end, business-elite aesthetic.

items.title: Saree
items.prompt:
Create a retro, vintage-inspired image with a grainy yet luminous finish. The girl is draped in a flawless plain purple saree, paired with a black sleeveless blouse, styled in a Pinterest-aesthetic, old-school elegance. The vibe captures the essence of a 90s movie “baddie” — dark brown, silky hair flowing naturally, with a small flower tucked visibly into her hair, enhanced by a soft, romantic breeze.

She stands against an aged wooden door, where deep shadows and dramatic contrasts heighten the mystery and artistic mood, creating an enchanting, cinematic atmosphere. The lighting feels warm and nostalgic, subtly dramatic yet inviting. Her pose is candid and graceful, caught mid-motion as she adjusts her saree, adding a sense of realism, confidence, and timeless charm.

items.title: Saree
items.prompt: A minimalist, Pinterest-aesthetic retro look featuring a plain red chiffon saree. The mood channels a 90s movie romance, with dark brown wavy-curly hair and a small flower tucked visibly into her curls, gently romanticizing a breezy, wind-kissed atmosphere. She stands against a solid, slightly textured wall, where deep shadows and high contrast create a sense of drama and mystery. Warm, golden lighting—reminiscent of sunset or golden hour—bathes the scene. Her expression is moody yet serene, quietly happy, and introspective.

items.title: Snow
items.prompt: Show a person sitting on a simple bench in a minimal winter-themed studio environment with soft snow falling around them. The person sits with legs wide apart, leaning slightly forward, hands together in front, creating a cool, confident, high-fashion editorial pose. The person must be wearing an oversized cream-colored fur coat with a large hood wrapped tightly around the face, covering most of the head and neck. Underneath, they should wear wide-leg winter pants, chunky white winter sneakers, white gloves, and dark futuristic sunglasses. Add a soft grey beanie under the hood, visible just slightly. Keep the ground snowy with scattered snow around their feet and lightly covering parts of the coat. Place a metal water bottle on the bench beside them, matching the reference object placement. The background should blend the studio with a natural outdoor view — visible through a wide, soft opening — showing snow-capped pine trees and distant mountains, adding a cinematic winter feel. Lighting should be bright, clean, and diffused with soft shadows. Capture crisp, ultra-realistic details in the fur texture, falling snowflakes, clothing fabric, and reflective sunglasses. Overall mood: luxury winter editorial, calm, confident, and visually striking

items.title: Stranger things
items.prompt:
Conversation with Gemini
Genera un retrato dramático inspirado en un poster de Stranger Things 4. Inserta el rostro de la persona de mi foto en el centro del encuadre con una expresión seria, intensa y emocional, mirando directamente al frente. Utiliza una iluminación cinematográfica con tonos rojizos, morados y oscuros que envuelven al personaje, creando un ambiente misterioso y sobrenatural. Añade un fondo compuesto por nubes densas, efectos de humo, destellos brillantes y partículas ardientes flotando alrededor del personaje, fusionándose con la escena para un acabado épico y apocalíptico. Agrega la silueta de una casa oscura sobre una colina. Incluye el número ‘4’ en rojo junto al logo de Stranger Things. Mantén estilo ochentero, textura cinematográfica, gradiente intenso, e integra el rostro de forma natural.

A soft mint-green studio backdrop with dreamy cinematic lighting emphasizes color harmony and smooth textures. The model reclines casually on a modern chair, one leg draped over the armrest, projecting effortless confidence.

items.title: Red

Background: a dramatic purple-toned studio backdrop with cinematic rim lighting that accentuates glossy satin textures and contrasts. The model crouches low with one arm resting on his knee, head tilted slightly, exuding intensity.

Natural posture, relaxed expression. Shot at eye level, even lighting, shallow depth of field, realistic colors, no stylization, looks like a DSLR photo.

The subject is placed against a dark, minimal background with soft frontal lighting emphasizing facial details. Expression is composed and serious. The subject stands in open shade with soft, diffused daylight. Expression is calm and natural. Background is lightly blurred with subtle environmental hints. The subject’s body is angled slightly to the side while the face remains clearly visible, adding depth and dimension. Soft directional lighting highlights facial contours. Shallow depth of field, natural skin texture, clean background, polished portrait photography style

items.title: Women
items.prompt: A realistic portrait of the person exactly as in the reference image, centered in the frame. The face remains unchanged. The subject is positioned near a window, softly lit by natural daylight from one side. Expression is relaxed and approachable, head slightly angled. Background is softly blurred and minimal. Shot at eye level, shallow depth of field, natural colors, clean and authentic portrait look.

items.title: Standing
items.prompt: Ultra realistic, hyper-detailed 8K portrait of a person standing indoors in a modern home interior, leaning casually against a blue table with both hands. He has short, neatly styled black hair, Face with the face from the uploaded image, keeping the facial features exactly the same. He is wearing a light mint green linen shirt, slightly transparent with natural fabric texture, sleeves rolled up casually, paired with crisp white pants. Natural daylight softly illuminates his face, highlighting skin texture and fine details. In the background, elegant interior décor is visible white lilies arranged in a tall yellow glass vase, additional green glass vases on a shelf, patterned wall design, and a mirror reflecting part of the room. The entire scene has a clean, fresh, modern, and luxurious lifestyle aesthetic with cinematic lighting and photorealistic details.i want same face as i uploaded no alternation 100% same. aspect ratio 4:5.

items.title: Tower
items.prompt:
Ultra-realistic 8K cinematic full-body portrait of a stylis young man leaning casually against a railing in front of the Eiffel Tower in Paris. His exact face and perfectly styled hairstyle match the uploaded reference image, with beard cut identical to the reference. His face is
directly toward the camera, with a confident, relaxed expression. He wears fitted light blue denim jeans, a crisp white t-shirt, and a denim jacket draped casually over one shoulder. Black sneakers and sleek sunglasses complete his modern street-style look. His body is slightly leaned against the railing, with one hand in his pocket and the other lightly holding the jacket, creating a stylish, effortless pose. The Eiffel Tower rises tall in the background beneath a dramatic cloudy sky. Captured from a low-angle perspective to enhance height and presence, with cinematic fashion editorial lighting, ultra-chann etails and luxury lifestyle aestheties."

items.title: walking
items.prompt: A realistic cinematic medium shot of the person exactly as shown in the reference image, centered in the frame. The face remains unchanged. The subject is walking forward through a quiet city street at night, mid-step, wearing a modern casual outfit with layered textures. Hands relaxed, natural motion in the body. Shot at eye level with subtle background blur. Cinematic lighting with soft streetlight highlights, shallow depth of field, subtle film grain, moody urban color grading, high-end cinematic still.

items.title: Coastal Power
items.prompt: A highly realistic cinematic wide shot of the person exactly as in the reference image, positioned perfectly at the center of the frame. The face, facial structure, and identity remain completely unchanged. The subject stands on a rugged coastal cliff as waves crash below, wearing a fitted dark jacket and neutral-toned trousers. The posture is strong and grounded, shoulders squared, arms relaxed by the sides. Shot from a slightly low angle to enhance presence. Natural dramatic lighting, shallow depth of field with environmental separation, cinematic contrast, film-style color grading, professional movie still quality.

items.title: Power

Dramatic cinematic lighting creates strong contrast and soft shadows. Shallow depth of field, film grain, moody color grading, professional cinema camera look.

items.title: Cinematic

The face, hairstyle, body, and outfit remain completely unchanged from the reference image. items.title: Cinematic

The man has a relaxed yet confident pose, with one hand resting on his knee and the other on his chest. A dark wallet or small clutch is placed on the wooden deck beside him. The lighting is soft and warm, highlighting the mak and the sunset. And don't change the face

items.prompt:

Shot on 35mm, shallow depth, photoreal 8K.

items.title: Dhurandhar
items.prompt: Ultra realistic, cinematic full-body portrait of the same young man from the reference photo (same hairstyle, sharp eyebrows, trimmed beard, and confident facial expression). A powerful cinematic scene showing a stylish villain making an intense entrance. A sharp-featured man wearing a black kurta, black overcoat, and dark sunglasses walks forward with a confident attitude. Warm golden sunlight filters through patterned fabric shades hanging overhead, creating dramatic light and shadow on his face. Behind him, two men follow - one elderly with a long white beard, black turban, layered grey robe, and heavy jewelry. The other younger man with a beard and dark glasses, dressed in dark traditional clothing. The environment looks like an ancient masketplace or desert fort made of sandstone, with textured walls and warm golden tones. The camera angle is slighly low, capturing a heoic, slow-motion walk. Highly detailed faces, crisp shadows, cinematic depth of field, rich colour grading, dramatic.
